decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposal for illumination of signage at then subject site would not be compatible with the character of the area and would result in and adverse impact on traffic safety. The proposal is considered to be contrary to Policies ENV 1.1 and ENV 1.7 of Council's Unitary Development Plan.

Condition : 2 - The proposed illumination of the approved signage scheme is unacceptable in that the illuminated nature of the signage and signage structures will result in a distraction to the vehicles moving along the Great West Road (A4), the North Circular Road (A406) and Larch Drive and will result in an unacceptable traffic hazard in the area.
description: Retention of seven illuminated 48 - sheet, six illuminated 96 sheet static advertisement hoardings and one illuminated 'difference' static advertisement hoarding
